items.title: Design and Implement Modern UI
items.description: Create a visually appealing, intuitive, accessible, and responsive user interface for the application, ensuring consistency across all modules and devices.
acceptance_criteria: UI follows a consistent color scheme, typography, and iconography as per approved brand guidelines
All screens are responsive and render correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices in both portrait and landscape modes
Navigation is intuitive with clear labels, icons, and logical menu structures
UI components load within 2 seconds on standard broadband connection under normal load
All interactive elements meet WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards, including keyboard navigation and screen reader support
Cross-browser compatibility verified for latest two versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
Error messages and system feedback are clear, concise, and follow the application's tone of voice
UI passes usability testing with at least 80% task completion rate by test participants
dependencies: Backend API endpoints for dynamic content

notes: Expanded requirement to include accessibility, usability testing, and performance criteria. Assumed that the UI overhaul is a high priority due to its potential impact on user satisfaction and engagement. Specific branding assets, target devices, and supported browsers should be confirmed.
